comment.author: 36811138@N07
comment._content: Wouldn't it be wonderful if these pictures were posted a little larger? Screen resolutions nowadays make for very small presentation of images...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: If you follow the persistent URL link, in this case to hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/stereo.1s01323 , you can get access to the source TIFF from which this size was generated.
